itunes:summary:
Modern Wisdom Podcast host Chris Williamson joins the show to talk about his show, interviewing Jordan Peterson, and why he got into podcasting -- plus the guys run through Bruce Willis' greatest movies from Pulp Fiction and Armaggedon to Die Hard and The Sixth Sense.
